actions.message:
```
hpw.Help                      Lists available commands
hpw.Kick [@user] [reason]     Kicks the mentioned user
hpw.Ban [@user] [reason]      Bans the mentioned user
hpw.Mute [@user]              Mutes the mentioned user
hpw.Unmute [@user]            Unmutes the mentioned user
hpw.DeleteChannel [#channel]  Deletes the mentioned channel
hpw.DeleteRole [#channel]     Deletes the mentioned role
hpw.Purge [number]            Purges the channel the command was used in
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:

```
Please mention one user in order to kick them!
!Kick [@user] [reason]
```
